name: Miss Sasha Sling Hobo Handbag
description:
The angels will surround you when you adorn yourself with this hand-stitched hobo. The pattern is a Cheetah print with woven threads of brown chenille. Throughout are hints of gold, black, and a taste of a very dark green. The heavy poly-coated stitching allows you to overstuff while the zipper closure keeps wandering hands off your essentials. But with this gorgeous bag, we canâ€™t do anything about the wandering eyes.

Bags measures 19" wide and 16 1/2" deep. The shoulder strap in 17" long. There is an interior and exterior back zippered pocket that allows for personals and quick reach items.

Any questions? Please ask me.

For more views of this bag and other Sasha Sling bags, please visit:

http://picasaweb.google.com/MissPrettyPerfect.com/SashaSlingShoulderBag?feat=directlink
